thread.title: Short 5 days stay
thread.title_full: Short 5 days stay - Review of Garden Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Osama D
title: Short 5 days stay
text: The hotel is very nice ,clean and quite . It s near to tesco market and sainsubury. 5min walk from bayswater underground station. It was surprise to me how clean and nice hotel it was . Definitely wil come back again . Room are small but i didnt nead more . Free coffe and tea at lobby . Breakfast is basic and clean
